DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety effectiveness MediENT MeroPack FESS .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Randomized , Multi-Center Evaluation MediENT® Middle Turbinate Implant Versus MeroPack® , Bioresorbable Nasal Dressing / Sinus Stent After Endoscopic Sinus Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: MediENT design minimize lateralization middle turbinate , cause scar obstruction key sinus opening endoscopic sinus surgery .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject age 18 65 year 2 . Subject schedule undergo bilateral endoscopic sinus surgery 3 . Subject sign IRBapproved inform consent form 4 . Subject agree comply studyrelated procedure 1 . History removal one middle turbinates 2 . Significant sinonasal polyp 3 . Presence mark septal asymmetry 4 . Presence significant concha bullosa , require surgical excision 5 . Presence nonviable tissue implantation site 6 . Has autoimmune disease , e.g. , lupus , Graves ' disease , myasthenia gravis , Wegener 's granulomatosis 7 . Known suspect allergy device component 8 . Participating another clinical trial could affect heal middle turbinate 9 . Uncontrolled diabetes 10 . Known suspected use illicit drug 11 . Known suspect alcoholism 12 . Other medical illness could prevent followup increase risk surgery 13 . Pregnant unwilling take pregnancy prevention measure 14 . Subject currently use CPAP ( Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ) sleep apnea
